attributes.action: Allow Class 2 Drivers to upgrade their licenses with no cost
attributes.additional_details: Make it easier for current class 2 drivers
attributes.background: To allow class 2 drivers free upgrade to training and licensing of class 1 HGV

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want the Government to eliminate the cost of going from a Class 2 to a Class 1 HGV licence, but we're not sure if you want the Government to fund free training and testing for this, or simply upgrade Class 2 licences to Class 1 licences.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Give Class 2 drivers a Class 1 license without needing to take the test: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596865
